abstract: At least 32 people are killed and dozens more injured when express train derails and hits safety barrier in northern India.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of people were reported injured after two coaches and the engine derailed in Uttar Pradesh, the authorities said.

headline.main: At Least 32 Killed After Express Train Strikes Barrier in Northern India
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: 32 Killed as Train Derails

snippet: Dozens of people were reported injured after two coaches and the engine derailed in Uttar Pradesh, the authorities said.
